Class MapReader

java.lang.Object
utils.MapReader
public class MapReader extends Object
A class to read, validate and save the map file

    • readMap

      public static void readMap(GameMap p_GameMap, String p_FileName) throws Exception
      Reads a map file and creates a game map object.
      Parameters:
      p_GameMap - The game map object to populate.
      p_FileName - The name of the map file to read.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while reading the map file.

    • saveMap

      public static boolean saveMap(GameMap p_GameMap, String p_FileName) throws Exception
      Saves a game map object to a map file.
      Parameters:
      p_GameMap - The game map object to save.
      p_FileName - The name of the map file to save.
      Returns:
      True if the map was saved successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while saving the map file.

    • validateMap

      public static boolean validateMap(GameMap p_GameMap)
      Validates a game map object.
      Parameters:
      p_GameMap - The game map object to validate.
      Returns:
      True if the game map is valid, false otherwise.
